Name: Battle Life Online
About the game: Battle Life Online is a unique combination of multiplayer FPS / TPS shooter, racing game and life sim. In short: PvP-RP With the option as a player to choose one of 4 factions (Civilian / Cop / Rebel / Tech), with different clothing, vehicles, weapons, special abilities and options. All this in a freely drivable and walkable Open-World with different climates. - Explore the +64kmÂ² island, which is divided into 4 different climate zones. With its lush meadows, dense forests, vast desert, or hot tropics, there is a lot to do and discover while interracting simultaneously withother real players. - For this, you get many different vehicles at your disposal, to get fast and 'safe?', from A to B, to attain your objectives. - Go your way as an outlaw or take part in adventures and events together with your friends in a group. - Experience a unique and dynamic open world PvP-system, which leads to tense situations. Are you a helpful savior of those in need? Or the rebel who knows no mercy? It's up to you. Civilians, Rebels, Cops, Techs, Weapons, Cars and the dear Money... Collect / Fight / Earn / Win
